ccawires.command.cca_api.link: Click here to open API documentation
item.ccawires.diamond_grit_sandpaper.too: Can be used to _refine materials_. The process can be automated with a Deployer.
Applies polish to items held in the _offhand_ or lying on the _floor_ when _looking at them_
item.ccawires.copper_spool.tooltip.behav: Will create a wire link between them, while retaining the _Empty Spool_.
item.ccawires.festive_spool.tooltip.beha: Will create a wire link between them and return an _Empty Spool_.
item.ccawires.gold_spool.tooltip.behavio: Will create a wire link between them, while retaining the _Empty Spool_.
item.ccawires.electrum_spool.tooltip.beh: Will create a wire link between them, while retaining the _Empty Spool_.
item.ccawires.spool.tooltip.behaviour1: Will remove the wire link and return a filled _spool_.
statusbar.ccawires.wire.requires_high_cu: This connection requires a high current wire
block.ccawires.huge_connector.tooltip.su: Connects _Forge Energy_ compatible blocks with _wires_ to transfer _⚡_.
block.ccawires.huge_connector.tooltip.be: While holding a _Copper Spool_, _Gold Spool_, or _Electrum Spool_ to create a _wire link_ with up to 4 other connectors.
block.ccawires.giant_connector.tooltip.s: Connects _Forge Energy_ compatible blocks with _wires_ to transfer _⚡_.
block.ccawires.giant_connector.tooltip.b: While holding a _Gold Spool_ or _Electrum Spool_ to create a _wire link_ with up to 6 other connectors.
block.ccawires.massive_connector.tooltip: Connects _Forge Energy_ compatible blocks with _wires_ to transfer _⚡_.
While holding a _Gold Spool_ or _Electrum Spool_ to create a _wire link_ with up to 6 other connectors.
block.ccawires.digital_adapter.tooltip.s: A _Computercraft Peripheral_ which allows computers to interface with _Display Boards_, _Speedometers_, _Stressometers_, _Rope Pulley_, _Hose Pulley_, _Elevator Pulley_, _Mechanical Piston_, _Mechanical Bearing_, and _Rotational Speed Controllers_.
ccawires.ponder.electric_motor.header: Generating Rotational Force using Electric Motors
ccawires.ponder.electric_motor.text_1: Electric Motors are a compact and configurable source of Rotational Force
ccawires.ponder.electric_motor.text_2: Scrolling on the back panel changes the RPM of the motor's rotational output
ccawires.ponder.electric_motor.text_3: The Electric Motor requires a source of energy
ccawires.ponder.electric_motor.text_4: The motor's energy consumption is determined by the set RPM
ccawires.ponder.alternator.header: Generating Electric energy using an Alternator
ccawires.ponder.alternator.text_1: The Alternator requires at least 32 RPM to operate
ccawires.ponder.alternator.text_2: It generates electric energy from rotational force
ccawires.ponder.alternator.text_3: Its energy production is determined by the input RPM
ccawires.ponder.rolling_mill.header: Rolling metals into Rods and Wires
ccawires.ponder.rolling_mill.text_1: The Rolling Mill uses rotational force to roll metals into Rods and Wires
ccawires.ponder.rolling_mill.text_2: To manually input items, drop Ingots or Plates on the top of the Mill
ccawires.ponder.rolling_mill.text_3: Right-click the Mill to manually retrieve the output items
ccawires.ponder.automated_rolling_mill.t: The Rolling Mill can be automated using a Belt and two Funnels
ccawires.ponder.cc_electric_motor.header: Using ComputerCraft to control an Electric Motor
ccawires.ponder.cc_electric_motor.text_1: The Electric Motor can be controlled using ComputerCraft
ccawires.ponder.cc_electric_motor.text_3: Get to the API documentation by issuing the command '/cca_api' in the chat
ccawires.ponder.tesla_coil.header: Using a Tesla Coil to charge Items
ccawires.ponder.tesla_coil.text_1: The Tesla Coil will charge Items below it
ccawires.ponder.tesla_coil.text_2: It will charge any Forge Energy Items and more!
ccawires.ponder.tesla_coil_hurt.text_1: The Tesla Coil is also able to inflict damage on nearby Players and Mobs
ccawires.ponder.tesla_coil_hurt.text_2: This can be activated with a Redstone signal
ccawires.ponder.liquid_blaze_burner.head: Liquid Fuel Burning
ccawires.ponder.liquid_blaze_burner.text: Giving the Blaze Burner a Straw
will allow it to accept liquid fuels by Buckets
ccawires.ponder.modular_accumulator.head: The Multi-block Accumulator
ccawires.ponder.modular_accumulator.text: The Accumulator is a multi-block structure
It can store large amounts of electric energy
To improve mod compatibility, the Accumulator will actively push energy to blocks placed on the top and bottom faces.
ccawires.ponder.pei_transfer.text_1: Accumulators on moving contraptions cannot connect to stationary connectors.
ccawires.ponder.pei_transfer.text_2: This component can interact with Accumulators without the need to stop the contraption.
ccawires.ponder.pei_transfer.text_3: Place a second one with a gap of 1 or 2 blocks inbetween
ccawires.ponder.pei_transfer.text_4: Whenever they pass by each other, they will engage in a connection
ccawires.ponder.pei_transfer.text_5: While engaged, the stationary interface will represent ALL Accumulators on the contraption
ccawires.ponder.pei_transfer.text_6: Energy can now be exchanged according to the Push/Pull configuration of the connector...
ccawires.ponder.pei_transfer.text_7: After no energy have been exchanged for a while, the contraption will continue on its way.
ccawires.ponder.pei_redstone.text_1: Redstone power will prevent the stationary interface from engaging.
death.attack.barbed_wire.player: %1$s tried to cross barbed wire while fighting %2$s
death.attack.tesla_coil.player: %1$s received a lethal electric shock while fighting %2$s
